channel.title: Why do i dc when pking?
channel.description: ok this has been anoying me for a while now on my server when i pk atfer a few hits i either get disconnected or the other person douse and it just keeps doing it why is this? i think its something in client.java but i cant remmeber were and how to fix please help ty
